BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S. 8705, and by the Committee on Rules (at the request of Assembly Member Silver), A. 11755, “AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to tax abatement and tax exemption for industrial and commercial work on properties in a city of one million or more persons”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Tax abatement/ exemption on commercial work (S.8705/A.11755)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Smith, S. 8289-A, and Assembly Member Pheffer, A. 11222-A, “AN ACT in relation to authorizing the city of New York to sell waterfront property and land under water appurtenant thereto, owned by such city, consisting of a tax lot improved with a pier in the county of Queens, known as Beach 84th Street Pier”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Padavan, Golden, Lanza and Maltese, S. 6366-A, and by the Committee on Rules (at the request of Assembly Members Silver and Farrell), A. 11586, “AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to tax abatement for industrial and commercial work on properties in a city of one million or more persons”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Lanza, S.7024-B, and Assembly Members Cusick, Eddington, Wright, Kellner, Peralta, et al, A.10119-C, “AN ACT to amend the general business law and the executive law, in relation to the licensing of security guards and the business of watch, guard or patrol agency and the registry thereof”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Licensing of security guards and the business of watch, guard or patrol agency and the registry thereof.  (S.7024-B/A.10119-C)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S. 8705, and by the Committee on Rules (at the request of Assembly Member Silver), A. 11755, “AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to tax abatement and tax exemption for industrial and commercial work on properties in a city of one million or more persons”.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Tax abatement/ exemption on commercial work (S.8705/A.11755)
